text: Idea: ability to clear out all rows in a Hubdb instead of just one at a time.
You can upload a file that just has one row in it and replace the entire table
yeah i’m aware of that trick, I just would like a simpler solution for one of my clients who will be periodically exporting data and wanting to clear it out after the export

Idea: allow us some kind of connection to SQL style DB where we can create our own reports (long shot wish - to give some idea, if you look at Skyvia, they have a query portion where you can grab data via that and build a sql query based on it)
We have bulk UI actions on the deck, I just haven't had the time to finish them yet
